# project-overlay



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                               | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `height` | `height`  | The height to start animating from.       | `number` | `0`     |
| `left`   | `left`    | The left position to start animating from | `number` | `0`     |
| `top`    | `top`     | The top position to start animating from. | `number` | `0`     |
| `width`  | `width`   | The width to start animating from.        | `number` | `0`     |


## Events

| Event   | Description                                 | Type                |
| ------- | ------------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `close` | Emits an event, when the overlay is closed. | `CustomEvent<void>` |
